thread.title: Saari Ki Saari Lyrics – Darshan Raval | Valentine’s Day Special
thread.title_full: Saari Ki Saari Lyrics – Darshan Raval | Valentine’s Day Special

author: lyricsmint
title: Saari Ki Saari Lyrics – Darshan Raval | Valentine’s Day Special
text:
56 SHARES Saari Ki Saari Lyrics: A special love song by Darshan Raval for this Valentine’s Day. The song is sung and written by Darshan Raval and composed by Rahul Munjariya & Darshan Raval. Saari Ki Saari - Darshan Raval | Valentine's Day Special 2017 
“Saari Ki Saari” has a beautiful music video which tells love story, every soldier has in his life. It is directed by Vishwanath Chatterjee and features Darshan Raval, Shraddha Dangar, Amit Behl, Neetu Pandey and more. Saari Ki Saari Lyrics 
Saari ki saari meri hai tu Tujhko kabhi na main baantun (x2) 
Kahunga jo main tumhe sunoge kya Rahoge na paas tum hamesha 
Har woh lamha Woh meri zindagi ho (x2) 
Saari ki saari meri hai tu Tujhko kabhi na main baantun (x2) 
Yun khushboo meri Hawaon mein mehsoos karna tum Likhe har lafz mere haathon se Use yaad rakhna tum (x2) 
Jab jab neend na aaye Meri yaad sataye Mujhe dil se pukaar lena Ehsaas banke tere paas rahu Bas mujhko dhoond lena
